song.verse: Thou, my everlasting portion,## More than friend or life to me,## All along my pilgrim journey,## Saviour, let me walk with Thee.## Close to Thee, close to Thee; (bis)## All along my pilgrim journey,## Saviour, let me walk with Thee.

Not for ease or worldly pleasure,## Not for fame my prayer shall be;## Gladly will I toil and suffer,## Only let me walk with Thee.## Close to Thee, close to Thee; (bis)## Gladly will I toil and suffer,## Only let me walk with Thee.

Lead me through the vale of shadows,## Bear me o'er life's fitful sea;## Then the gate of life eternal## May I enter, Lord, with Thee;## Close to Thee, close to Thee; (bis)## Then the gate of life eternal## May I enter, Lord, with Thee.
